file.content:
{
  "name": "our-pot-qa",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "QA and regression testing suite for OurPot application",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "playwright test",
    "test:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:headed": "playwright test --headed",
    "test:debug": "playwright test --debug",
    "test:smoke": "playwright test tests/smoke/ --grep @smoke",
    "test:regression": "playwright test tests/regression/ --grep @regression",
    "test:critical": "playwright test tests/critical/ --grep @critical",
    "test:release-v2.0": "playwright test tests/regression/release-v2.0/",
    "test:smoke:nav": "playwright test tests/smoke/navigation.spec.ts",
    "test:smoke:design": "playwright test tests/smoke/stitch-design.spec.ts",
    "report": "playwright show-report",
    "codegen": "playwright codegen"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@playwright/test": "^1.40.0",
    "@types/node": "^20.10.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.0"
  }
}

content.content:

content.text:
All 40 smoke tests passed. Here's the full breakdown:

---

### Smoke Test Results — 40/40 Passed ✓

Tests ran across **2 browser profiles** (desktop-chrome + mobile-android) against the Vercel preview deployment.

**navigation.spec.ts — Navigation Tests (10/10 passed)**
| Test | Result |
|---|---|
| should load home page | ✓ |
| should navigate to transactions | ✓ |
| should navigate to agent | ✓ |
| should navigate to settings | ✓ |
| should display all nav items | ✓ |

**stitch-design.spec.ts — Design Element Tests (15/15 passed per browser)**
| Suite | Tests | Result |
|---|---|---|
| Home Page Elements | spending insight card, quick action buttons, members section, recent activity | ✓ all |
| Transactions Page Elements | month selector, summary stats, empty state with CTA | ✓ all |
| Agent Page Elements | agent tabs, smart input, example prompts, parse button disabled | ✓ all |
| Settings Page Elements | pot settings section, data management section, coming soon features, dark mode toggle | ✓ all |

---

## Status
DONE

## What Changed
- No files changed — read-only test run

## Key Decisions
- None required; all 40 tests passed cleanly on first run in ~20 seconds

## PR / Branch
- None created
